forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally cloudy. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 16C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. Slight chance of a rain shower. High near 60F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 49F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with a few showers. High around 15C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies. Slight chance of a rain shower. High near 60F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy after midnight. Slight chance of a shower throughout the evening. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies. Slight chance of a shower throughout the evening. Low 49F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 17C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 63F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers after midnight. Low 11C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low 52F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High near 15C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High near 60F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 12C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 54F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain ending early. Remaining cloudy. High 14C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain ending early. Remaining cloudy. High 56F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low 8C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers after midnight. Low near 45F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 11C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 52F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Steady light rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 6C. Winds N at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 43F. Winds N at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning becoming more intermittent in the afternoon. High around 10C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 51F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with clearing later at night. Low around 5C. Winds N at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening becoming more intermittent overnight. Low 41F. Winds N at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny skies. High 11C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies. High 52F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low 42F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 53F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
